name: riven
description: Riven is a self-hosted media automation platform similar to Sonarr/Radarr but built for managing music, movies, and TV libraries with customizable pipelines.
features: Media automation: Automatically download and organize movies, TV shows, and music.
Custom pipelines: Build workflows that match your specific media management needs.
Multi-source search: Query multiple indexers and trackers simultaneously for content.
Quality profiles: Define preferred formats, resolutions, and codecs for downloads.
Library organization: Automatically rename and sort media into structured folders.
Metadata enrichment: Fetch posters, descriptions, and details from online databases.
Download monitoring: Track active downloads and manage queue priorities.
Upgrade automation: Replace existing media with higher quality versions when available.
Calendar view: See upcoming releases and scheduled downloads on a timeline.
Notification system: Get alerts when new content is added or downloads complete.
API integration: Connect to download clients, media servers, and other tools.
Web interface: Manage your entire media automation setup through a browser.
